description: Change of use from garden summer house (Use class C3) to Canine Beauty Parlour (Use Class Sui Generis)
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated through the submission of clear, comprehensive information about the proposed use that the proposed change of use would not give rise to unacceptable levels of noise, nuisance and waste arisings which would adversely impact the residential amenities of neighbours, contrary to Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed change of use would not adversely impact on-street car parking stress and that the development would not lead to inconsiderate or illegal car parking that would pose a risk to highway safety and would harm neighbouring amenity, contrary to Policies DM9 and DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
